attributes.action: Make it the law that if you run over a cat in an RTC you must legally report it.
attributes.additional_details: We want the law changed. We want the same rules regarding RTCs for dogs to apply for cats. Cats deserve equal rights, families of the cats deserve it too.
attributes.background:
Today, I lost my boy Bob due to a hit and run. Bob was a very large cat, bigger than a small dog. Whoever ran over my cat, knows they did it. But left him to die alone.
I want the same laws introduced for cats that are in place if a dog is hit by a car. Cats are just as loved and family too.

rejection.details:
We are very sorry to hear about the loss of your cat. Please accept our condolences.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622511
